ayah: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
ayah_translit: tabaraka alladhi biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: Blessed is He in Whose Hand (is) the Dominion and He (is) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ
ayah_translit: alladhi khalaqa al-mawta wal-hayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu amalan wahuwa al-'azizu al-ghafuru
ayah_english: The One Who created death and life that He may test you which of you (is) best (in) deed And He (is) the All-Mighty the Oft-Forgiving

ayah: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗاۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِن تَفَٰوُتٖۖ فَٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٖ
ayah_translit: alladhi khalaqa sab'a samawatin tibaqan ma tara fi khalqi al-rahmani min tafawutin fa-ir'ji'i al-basara hal tara min futurin
ayah_english: The One Who created seven heavens one above another Not you see in (the) creation (of) the Most Gracious any fault So return the vision can you see any flaw

ayah: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗاۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِن تَفَٰوُتٖۖ فَٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٖ

ayah: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: thumma ir'ji'i al-basara karratayni yanqalib ilayka al-basaru khasi-an wahuwa hasirun
ayah_english: Then return the vision twice again Will return to you the vision humbled while it (is) fatigued

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِمَصَٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا رُجُومٗا لِّلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayah_translit: walaqad zayyanna al-samaa al-dun'ya bimasabiha waja'alnaha rujuman lilshayatini wa-a'tadna lahum adhaba al-sa'iri
ayah_english: And certainly We have beautified the heaven nearest with lamps and We have made them (as) missiles for the devils and We have prepared for them punishment (of) the Blaze

ayah: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: walilladhina kafaru birabbihim adhabu jahannama wabi'sa al-masiru
ayah_english: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord (is the) punishment (of) Hell and wretched is the destination

ayah_translit: idha ul'qu fiha sami'u laha shahiqan wahiya tafuru
ayah_english: When they are thrown therein they will hear from it an inhaling while it boils up

ayah: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَيۡظِۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلۡقِيَ فِيهَا فَوۡجٞ سَأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ
ayah_translit: takadu tamayyazu mina al-ghayzi kullama ul'qiya fiha fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuha alam yatikum nadhirun
ayah_english: It almost bursts with rage Every time is thrown therein a group will ask them its keepers Did not come to you a warner

ayah: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ
ayah_translit: qalu bala qad jaana nadhirun fakadhabna waqul'na ma nazzala al-lahu min shayin in antum illa fi dalalin kabirin
ayah_english: They will say Yes indeed came to us a warner but we denied and we said Not has sent down Allah any thing Not you (are) but in error great

ayah: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayah_translit: waqalu law kunna nasma'u aw na'qilu ma kunna fi ashabi al-sa'iri
ayah_english: And they will say If we had listened or reasoned not we (would) have been among (the) companions (of) the Blaze

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولٗا فَٱمۡشُواْ فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-arda dhalulan fa-im'shu fi manakibiha wakulu min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi al-nushuru
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who made for you the earth subservient so walk in (the) paths thereof and eat of His provision and to Him (is) the Resurrection

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who made for you the earth subservient so walk in (the) paths thereof and eat of His provision and to Him (is) the Resurrection

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولٗا فَٱمۡشُواْ فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ

ayah: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
ayah_translit: a-amintum man fi al-samai an yakhsifa bikumu al-arda fa-idha hiya tamuru
ayah_english: Do you feel secure (from Him) Who (is) in the heaven not He will cause to swallow you the earth when it sways

ayah: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ
ayah_translit: am amintum man fi al-samai an yur'sila alaykum hasiban fasata'lamuna kayfa nadhiri
ayah_english: Or do you feel secure (from Him) Who (is) in the heaven not He will send against you a storm of stones Then you would know how (was) My warning

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
ayah_translit: walaqad kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fakayfa kana nakiri
ayah_english: And indeed denied those from before them and how was My rejection

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٖ وَيَقۡبِضۡنَۚ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءِۭ بَصِيرٌ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw ila al-tayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbid'na ma yum'sikuhunna illa al-rahmanu innahu bikulli shayin basirun
ayah_english: Do not they see [to] the birds above them spreading (their wings) and folding Not holds them except the Most Gracious Indeed He (is) of every thing All-Seer

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٖ وَيَقۡبِضۡنَۚ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءِۭ بَصِيرٌ

ayah: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ جُندٞ لَّكُمۡ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ
ayah_translit: amman hadha alladhi huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min duni al-rahmani ini al-kafiruna illa fi ghururin
ayah_english: Who is this the one he (is) an army for you to help you from besides the Most Gracious Not (are) the disbelievers but in delusion

ayah: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُۥۚ بَل لَّجُّواْ فِي عُتُوّٖ وَنُفُورٍ
ayah_translit: amman hadha alladhi yarzuqukum in amsaka riz'qahu bal lajju fi utuwwin wanufurin

ayah: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُۥۚ بَل لَّجُّواْ فِي عُتُوّٖ وَنُفُورٍ

ayah: أَفَمَن يَمۡشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦٓ أَهۡدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمۡشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayah_translit: afaman yamshi mukibban ala wajhihi ahda amman yamshi sawiyyan ala siratin mus'taqimin
ayah_english: Then is he who walks fallen on his face better guided or (he) who walks upright on (the) Path Straight

ayah: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَكُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul huwa alladhi ansha-akum waja'ala lakumu al-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
ayah_english: Say He (is) the One Who produced you and made for you the hearing and the vision and the feelings Little (is) what you give thanks

ayah: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul huwa alladhi dhara-akum fi al-ardi wa-ilayhi tuh'sharuna
ayah_english: Say He (is) the One Who multiplied you in the earth and to Him you will be gathered

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَةٗ سِيٓـَٔتۡ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma ra-awhu zul'fatan siat wujuhu alladhina kafaru waqila hadha alladhi kuntum bihi tadda'una
ayah_english: But when they (will) see it approaching (will be) distressed (the) faces (of) those who disbelieved and it will be said This (is) that which you used (to) for it call

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum in ahlakaniya al-lahu waman ma'iya aw rahimana faman yujiru al-kafirina min adhabin alimin
ayah_english: Say Have you seen if destroys me Allah and whoever (is) with me or has mercy upon us then who (can) protect the disbelievers from a punishment painful

ayah: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: qul huwa al-rahmanu amanna bihi wa'alayhi tawakkalna fasata'lamuna man huwa fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: Say He (is) the Most Gracious; we believe in Him and upon Him we put (our) trust So soon you will know who (is) it (that is) in error clear

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum in asbaha maukum ghawran faman yatikum bimain ma'inin
ayah_english: Say Have you seen if becomes your water sunken then who could bring you water flowing
